title: Ice Sickle
summaries: The Ice Sickle is a Hardmode melee weapon that fires a projectile with no ammunition or mana cost. The projectile will gradually reduce speed and eventually stops in midair, exist up to 5 seconds before disappearing, and can pierce a limited number of targets. It can be dropped by Armored Vikings, Ice Elementals, Ice Tortoises, and Icy Mermen, these enemies can spawn in Snow and Ice biomes.

On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, its projectile deals 67% (33) base damage and can pierce up to 3 enemies, dissipating upon hitting the fourth. Its drop chance is 1*1/100 (1%).

On the [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console version and Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version, its projectile deals 100% (40) base damage and can pierce up to 4 enemies, dissipating upon hitting the fifth. Its drop chance is 0.56*1/180 (0.56%).

statistics.Damage: 50 (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 40 (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) (Melee)
